codewalk.title: Punycode codec
codewalk.step: Punycode is a derivitive of the Bootstring algorithm. It's been standardized in RFC 3492. Punycode is used by the IDNA protocol [IDNA] for converting domain labels into ASCII; it is not designed for any other purpose. It is explicitly not designed for processing arbitrary free text.
The Bootstring algorithm takes a couple of constant parameters which are defined as such.
